about_the_game:
Bravest Chicken is a precision platformer about a chicken trying to get to the top of the tower. Jump your way through various obstacles and don't hit anything, unless you want to lose control of the chicken and fall down. Don't worry though! You can try again, again and again...

Gameplay


Precision platforming where every jump counts!
Jump your way around the level to go up. Avoid the obstacles because if you hit an obstacle you lose control of the chicken and you'll fall.

Jump repeatedly to go up!
You can jump when already in the air! How cool is that?!

Avoid obstacles or you'll fall down!
Hitting an obstacle makes you lose control of the chicken until you hit the ground again. Choose your jumps wisely!

Show off your skills!
Bravest Chicken is a game of skill. Perfect the art of jumping, avoid the obstacles flawlessly and get to the top!
